nodes.text: Sola Hus was a Human male officer of the Corellian Security Force who lived on Corellia during the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, Sergeant Hus was investigating some thefts committed by the Braggan's Fist thugs. He hired a spacer to recover stolen goods from the Braggan's Fist Camp camp near Tyrena. The spacer succeed in the mission and Sola Hus was very grateful, hoping to get a promotion and leave off bookkeeping work.

Sola Hus appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Sola Hus was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
